name: Dumagu
description:
A simple quest of a Frog to save his Queen.

Built from scratch, only few free assets from the below credits were prebuilt, for the Mini Jam 79 with 72 hours using Construct 3 game engine.

If you like my game and interested in supporting my work on PayPal | Patreon | BuyMeACoffee

Graphics from Kenney.nl, vecteezy.com, pngtree.com, pixabay.com

BG from soundimage.org/fantasywonder 

Sounds from zapsplat.com
